name: WordPress Health and Server Condition – Integrated with Google Page Speed
author: alisaleem252

sections.description:
Display Your WordPress Condition in Charts and table

  • Performance Score: Provides a performance score that summarizes the page’s performance.
  • Field Data: Uses real-world, user-collected data to evaluate the performance of a page.
  • Lab Data: Provides performance metrics collected in a controlled environment.
  • Opportunities: Provides suggestions for improving the page’s performance metrics.
  • Diagnostics: Provides additional information about how a page adheres to best practices for web development.
  • Passed Audits: A list of audits that the page passed. These indicate practices that the page implements correctly.
  • Stack Packs: Provides recommendations for popular JavaScript frameworks and WordPress.
  • Database Performance,
  • Memory Usage,
  • Peak Memory Usage,
  • Page load time,
  • Average Page load time,

    • More features coming soon.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip into your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Visit the WP Condition Settings, Submit your Google API Key.
  4. Visit WP Condition Menu, Wait for first analysis.
sections.changelog:
4.1.0

  • Added Mobile Page Speed Analysis Support
  • Added Demo Video

4.0.0

  • Added Google Page Speed Analysis
  • Save Analysis Data.
  • Display Data by date.

1.0.0

  • Initial release!
